17. Chris Quested + 1 child

Hi All

Just a quick catch up.
I have 17 Groups booked & paid for this event. Space is limited so if you would like to join us please book in when you get a chance.

Sadly this will be the last year this event will be running, due to us closing the campsite for next year. (yet to be 100% confirmed but more than likely)
This is due to members of the general public who spoil it for everyone else with noise, litter etc. (sad to see)

So lets make it a good one. Anyone have any suggestions on what they would like to do whilst they are here?

All the best

Ian
